summary: An innocent girl goes to spend the weekend on an island with a woman and her brother, but soon she finds herself entangled in a web of dream-like sexual experiments.
cast: Maria Rohm|Marie Liljedahl|Jack Taylor|Christopher Lee|Paul Muller|María Luisa Ponte|Anney Kablan|Uta Dahlberg|Jesús Franco|Herbert Fux|Colette Jack|Nino Korda|Kathy Lagarde
keywords: erotica|psychological manipulation|deception|reference to the marquis de sade|sex with stepsister
title: La isla de la muerte
